history.proof: intros x. unfold predZ, succZ. destruct x as [|n|n]. - reflexivity. - reflexivity. - hauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat Unable to unify "neg n" with "match match n with | 0 => OZ | S m => neg m end with | OZ => neg 0 | pos 0 => OZ | pos (S m) => pos m | neg n => neg (S n) end".

original: intros x. unfold predZ, succZ. destruct x as [|n|n]. - reflexivity. - reflexivity. - reflexivity.
